JAP: Desert Well 01 unlocked.
FR: Le puits de sable nº#1 est activé.
OUPS: Desert Well 01 unlocked.

JAP: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.
FR: Vous devez activer un autre puits avant de pouvoir l'utiliser.
OUPS: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.

JAP: Desert Well 02 unlocked.
FR: Le puits de sable nº#2 est activé.
OUPS: Desert Well 02 unlocked.

JAP: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.
FR: Vous devez activer un autre puits avant de pouvoir l'utiliser.
OUPS: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.

JAP: Desert Well 03 unlocked.
FR: Le puits de sable nº#3 est activé.
OUPS: Desert Well 03 unlocked.

JAP: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.
FR: Vous devez activer un autre puits avant de pouvoir l'utiliser.
OUPS: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.

JAP: Desert Well 04 unlocked.
FR: Le puits de sable nº#3 est activé.
OUPS: Desert Well 04 unlocked.

JAP: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.
FR: Vous devez activer un autre puits avant de pouvoir l'utiliser.
OUPS: You must unlock another well before you can use them to fast-travel.

JAP: What is this, a fountain?
FR: Qu'est-ce que c'est, un puits#?
OUPS: What is this, a fountain?

JAP: It appears to be out of service.
FR: Il semble tari.
OUPS: It appears to be out of service.

JAP: I don't have time for sightseeing.
FR: Ce n'est pas le moment d'errer sans but.
OUPS: I don't have time for sightseeing.

JAP: I don't need to go out quite yet.
FR: Je n'ai pas besoin de sortir du village.
OUPS: I don't need to go out quite yet.

JAP: She couldn't have left the village...
FR: Elle ne pourrait pas avoir quitté le village...
OUPS: She couldn't have left the village...

JAP: I think Popola said to head east...
FR: Je crois que Popola a dit d'aller vers l'est...
OUPS: I think Popola said to head east...

JAP: I'd better look around town some more.
FR: Je devrais fouiller la ville.
OUPS: I'd better look around town some more.

JAP: I need to gather more info from the villagers.
FR: Je dois interroger les villageois et obtenir plus d'informations.
OUPS: I need to gather more info from the villagers.

JAP: I need to kill all the Shades first.
FR: Je dois d'abord me débarrasser des Ombres.
OUPS: I need to kill all the Shades first.

JAP: I can't get in yet...
FR: Je ne peux pas encore y entrer.
OUPS: I can't get in yet...

JAP: This place is lousy with Shades. There's got to be a Sealed Verse nearby.
FR: Cet endroit fourmille d'Ombres. Il doit y avoir un vers scellé dans les environs.
OUPS: This place is lousy with Shades. There's got to be a Sealed Verse nearby.

JAP: I don't think you can venture in here again.
FR: Je ne crois pas que tu puisses pénétrer de nouveau en cet endroit.
OUPS: I don't think you can venture in here again.

JAP: I should go to the library and see what Popola's up to.
FR: Je dois aller à la bibliothèque. Popola m'attend.
OUPS: I should go to the library and see what Popola's up to.

JAP: No. I'm not gonna leave now.
FR: Non. Je ne vais pas la quitter maintenant.
OUPS: No. I'm not gonna leave now.

JAP: We should go talk to Popola.
FR: Nous devrions aller parler à Popola.
OUPS: We should go talk to Popola.

JAP: Might as well head for Facade.
FR: Nous devrions nous rendre à Façade.
OUPS: Might as well head for Facade.

JAP: Enough horseplay!
FR: Assez plaisanté !
OUPS: Enough horseplay!

JAP: These people need your help! Hurry!
FR: Ces gens ont besoin de ton aide !
OUPS: These people need your help! Hurry!

JAP: I should go to the library and see what Popola's up to.
FR: Je dois aller à la bibliothèque. Popola m'attend.
OUPS: I should go to the library and see what Popola's up to.

JAP: I'd better get this meat back to the village.
FR: Bien. Il ne me reste plus qu'à apporter la viande à l'apothicaire.
OUPS: I'd better get this meat back to the village.

JAP: The sandstorm's too intense to go any further.
FR: La tempête m'empêche d'aller plus loin.
OUPS: The sandstorm's too intense to go any further.

JAP: Popola said we might be able to find a key fragment in the Junk Heap.
FR: Popola a dit que nous pourrions trouver un fragment de la clef dans la montagne des robots.
OUPS: Popola said we might be able to find a key fragment in the Junk Heap.

JAP: Perhaps we can find a clue at Two Brothers Weaponry.
FR: Nous découvrirons sans doute un indice à l'armurerie des frères.
OUPS: Perhaps we can find a clue at Two Brothers Weaponry.

JAP: Popola said we might be able to find something in the Forest of Myth.
FR: Popola a dit que nous pourrions trouver quelque chose dans la forêt des légendes.
OUPS: Popola said we might be able to find something in the Forest of Myth.

JAP: You will forgive me if I seem less than enthusiastic about such a trip.
FR: J'espère que tu excuseras mon manque d'enthousiasme.
OUPS: You will forgive me if I seem less than enthusiastic about such a trip.

JAP: Let's see if the Junk Heap kid sent us a letter.
FR: Allons voir si nous avons reçu une lettre du gamin de la montagne des robots.
OUPS: Let's see if the Junk Heap kid sent us a letter.

JAP: Maybe Popola has some new information. Let's go see her.
FR: Popola a peut-être plus d'informations. Allons la voir.
OUPS: Maybe Popola has some new information. Let's go see her.

JAP: Very well.
FR: Bien.
OUPS: Very well.

JAP: Are you ready for battle?
FR: Es-tu prêt à combattre#?
OUPS: Are you ready for battle?

JAP: Yeah. We have to avenge Fyra.
FR: Oui, nous devons venger Fyra.
OUPS: Yeah. We have to avenge Fyra.

JAP: I'm ready to strengthen your weapon anytime.
FR: Je peux améliorer vos armes quand vous voulez#!
OUPS: I'm ready to strengthen your weapon anytime.

JAP: <LIST=94>Strengthen weapons</LIST>
FR: <LIST=94>Forge</LIST>
OUPS: <LIST=94>Strengthen weapons</LIST>

JAP: <LIST=95>Buy and sell items</LIST>
FR: <LIST=95>Magasin</LIST>
OUPS: <LIST=95>Buy and sell items</LIST>

JAP: <LIST=96>Cancel</LIST>
FR: <LIST=96>Annuler</LIST>
OUPS: <LIST=96>Cancel</LIST>

JAP: Come back soon!
FR: À bientôt#!
OUPS: Come back soon!

JAP: What can I help you with?
FR: En quoi puis-je vous être utile#?
OUPS: What can I help you with?

JAP: <LIST=99>Strengthen weapons</LIST>
FR: <LIST=99>Forge</LIST>
OUPS: <LIST=99>Strengthen weapons</LIST>

JAP: <LIST=100>Buy and sell items</LIST>
FR: <LIST=100>Magasin</LIST>
OUPS: <LIST=100>Buy and sell items</LIST>

JAP: <LIST=101>Cancel</LIST>
FR: <LIST=101>Annuler</LIST>
OUPS: <LIST=101>Cancel</LIST>

JAP: Come back soon!
FR: À bientôt#!
OUPS: Come back soon!

JAP: Hello. Can I help you with something?
FR: Bonjour. En quoi puis-je vous être utile#?
OUPS: Hello. Can I help you with something?

JAP: We need to go to the courtyard.
FR: Nous devons aller dans la cour.
OUPS: We need to go to the courtyard.

JAP: Perhaps we should pay a visit to the old woman in the lighthouse.
FR: Nous devrions peut-être aller rendre visite à la vieille dame du phare.
OUPS: Perhaps we should pay a visit to the old woman in the lighthouse.

JAP: I have a suspicion about her...
FR: J'ai quelques doutes...
OUPS: I have a suspicion about her...

JAP: This is hardly the time to be writing letters.
FR: Ce n'est pas le moment d'écrire des lettres.
OUPS: This is hardly the time to be writing letters.

JAP: I guess it's locked.
FR: La porte est verrouillée...
OUPS: I guess it's locked.

JAP: What's with this room?
FR: À quoi sert cette pièce#?
OUPS: What's with this room?

JAP: The hell should I know? Maybe it's Popola's hobby corner or something.
FR: Hum... Je crois que Popola y range habituellement ses objets favoris.
OUPS: The hell should I know? Maybe it's Popola's hobby corner or something.

JAP: What's that?
FR: Mais c'est...
OUPS: What's that?

JAP: It looks like the Shade we saw in the Lost Shrine.
FR: Cela ressemble à la statue que nous avons combattue dans le temple oublié.
OUPS: It looks like the Shade we saw in the Lost Shrine.

JAP: It's that lizard thing we fought in The Aerie.
FR: C'est l'Ombre géante de l'Aire qui ressemblait à un lézard.
OUPS: It's that lizard thing we fought in The Aerie.

JAP: Who would make a figure of that, anyway? And what is it doing here!?
FR: Je n'arrive pas à croire qu'un artiste ait été inspiré par une créature aussi dégoûtante... et encore moins que quelqu'un voudrait exhiber son œuvre#!
OUPS: Who would make a figure of that, anyway? And what is it doing here!?

JAP: It's a sculpted leaf. Um...right?
FR: Une branche sculptée...?
OUPS: It's a sculpted leaf. Um...right?

JAP: This is the first sane thing I've seen in this room.
FR: C'est la seule chose sensée dans cette pièce.
OUPS: This is the first sane thing I've seen in this room.

JAP: This is from the Junk Heap.
FR: Serait-ce l'énorme machine de la montagne des robots#?
OUPS: This is from the Junk Heap.

JAP: For a decoration, it's certainly in poor taste.
FR: Ce n'est pas vraiment ce qu'on pourrait appeler un objet décoratif...
OUPS: For a decoration, it's certainly in poor taste.

JAP: We saw this cube back in the Barren Temple.
FR: Nous avons vu des boîtes semblables dans le temple stérile.
OUPS: We saw this cube back in the Barren Temple.

JAP: Perhaps the prince of Facade gave it to Popola as a gift?
FR: Il s'agit peut-être d'un cadeau du roi de Façade.
OUPS: Perhaps the prince of Facade gave it to Popola as a gift?

JAP: Look, Weiss! Somebody made a copy of you!
FR: Tiens, cette figurine te ressemble, Weiss#!
OUPS: Look, Weiss! Somebody made a copy of you!

JAP: Nonsense! Rubbish! Utter flimflam! I am nowhere near this filthy!
FR: Pfft#! Je ne suis pas aussi poussiéreux#!
OUPS: Nonsense! Rubbish! Utter flimflam! I am nowhere near this filthy!

JAP: We saw this Shade in the Lost Shrine. What's it doing here?
FR: C'est l'autre statue du temple oublié. Que fait-elle ici#?
OUPS: We saw this Shade in the Lost Shrine. What's it doing here?

JAP: I have long ceased trying to puzzle out this room.
FR: Qui sait#?
OUPS: I have long ceased trying to puzzle out this room.

JAP: It's a statue...of a boy.
FR: C'est une figurine d'un garçon.
OUPS: It's a statue...of a boy.

JAP: Popola certainly has some eccentric tastes.
FR: Popola a des goûts vraiment bizarres...
OUPS: Popola certainly has some eccentric tastes.

JAP: What on earth...?
FR: C'est...
OUPS: What on earth...?

JAP: It's the massive Shade we saw in The Aerie.
FR: La sphère qui est apparue dans le village de l'Aire.
OUPS: It's the massive Shade we saw in The Aerie.

JAP: I don't even want to know.
FR: Que peut-elle bien faire ici...?
OUPS: I don't even want to know.

JAP: A wolf figurine?
FR: Un bibelot en forme de loup#?
OUPS: A wolf figurine?

JAP: Of very fine construction, I would add.
FR: Quel chef-d'œuvre...!
OUPS: Of very fine construction, I would add.

JAP: This looks like Emil's sister.
FR: Oh, une statuette de la sœur d'Émile...
OUPS: This looks like Emil's sister.

JAP: An exquisite piece of work! It feels as alive as you or I.
FR: Elle lui ressemble comme deux gouttes d'eau#!
OUPS: An exquisite piece of work! It feels as alive as you or I.

JAP: I remember killing this bastard in the Junk Heap.
FR: Oh, le robot qui a voulu protéger la petite Ombre...
OUPS: I remember killing this bastard in the Junk Heap.

JAP: It was a fearsome foe, but under this environment, it looks almost...charming.
FR: Il nous a donné du fil à retordre, mais je dois avouer que dans cette pièce, il n'a pas l'air si dangereux.
OUPS: It was a fearsome foe, but under this environment, it looks almost...charming.

JAP: Why would Popola be collecting figures of the Shades we defeated?
FR: Pourquoi Popola collectionne-t-elle des modèles réduits de monstres que nous avons combattus#?
OUPS: Why would Popola be collecting figures of the Shades we defeated?

JAP: I haven't a clue.
FR: Je n'en ai aucune idée.
OUPS: I haven't a clue.

JAP: Ah, hell. If they aren't real, I guess I don't give a damn. Let her do what she wants.
FR: Du moment que ce ne sont pas les vrais monstres, peu m'importe.
OUPS: Ah, hell. If they aren't real, I guess I don't give a damn. Let her do what she wants.

JAP: It seems we have been shut in...
FR: On dirait que la porte est verrouillée...
OUPS: It seems we have been shut in...

JAP: Welcome! I'm afraid we don't have anything in stock at the moment, but please come again!
FR: Bienvenue#! Je n'ai rien à vous offrir aujourd'hui, mais revenez bientôt#!
OUPS: Welcome! I'm afraid we don't have anything in stock at the moment, but please come again!
